title: Nee Poiya Lyrics Isai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Isai Â Nee poiya song lyrics
Singer : Vijay Yesudhas
Music : SJ Surya

Naan kaanbadhu ingu unmaya
Uyire en uyire
nee saagaadhiru

Naan vazhvadhey ingu unmaya
En manamey en manamey
Nee veelaadhiru

Enai sutta nilavu poiya
Enai thotta thendral poiya
Nee itta muththam poiya
Penne nee meiyya illai poiya

Siruoru idhayaththai
Marupadi Marupadi
Ulagamey midhiththadi

Valiyilum thuyarilum
Kulambiya irudhayam
Unakena thudiththadhadi

Veelgayil naan veelgayil
Un kadhal thaangumadi

Neeyumey poi aaginaal
En uyire neengumadi

Nee poiya
Yaar kettadhu indha kadhalai
Ye vizhiye ne avalai yen kaatinaai

Yaar kettadhu indha poiyinai
Ye manamey enaye ne emaattrinaai

Aval mooral muluvadhum poiya
Aval vizhiyin mozhigal poiya
Aval muththam moththam poiya
Enakaai thudiththaale
Adhu poiya

Kanavugal vilaivadhum
Kanavugal kalaivadhum
Dhinam dhinam nigalvadhadi

Oru yuga ninaivinai
Nodiyinil udaipadhu
Kodumayin kodumayadi

Pillai pol siru pillai pol
Oru nenjam kondirundhaen
Mullai pol oru Mullai pol
Adhil unnai sumandhirundhaen .
Kilikindraen.

Kaatrindiye ingu vaasamaa
Ye malare un idhalaal nee pesinaai

Vaan indriye ingu thooralaa
Ye mugilae yaen thuliyaai
Ne poi pesinaai.

Avalin kanmai Unmai
Aval idhalin menmai Unmai
Aval penmai kooda Unmai
Meyyae poi endraal
Edhu Unmai ?

Avalayum isaiyayum
Enadhiru vizhiyena
Ulagaththai rasithirundhaen.

Vizhigalil pilai illai
Ulagamey dhideerena
Irundida kulambi nindraen.

Aimbulab en aimbulam
Unnai aiyyam kolludhadi
Nenjamo en nenjamo
Adhai yetrida marukkudhadi

Edhu Unmai ?
Edhu Unmai?
